title: Table 1: % Children enrolled in different types of schools. By age group and sex. 2024
description: School enrollment statistics for Odisha in 2024, categorized by age group (6-16) and gender. The table details the percentage of children in Government, Private, and Other schools, as well as out-of-school rates. It also includes longitudinal trends (2006-2024) for older age groups and government school enrollment trends (2018-2024).
data: | Age group and sex | Govt | Pvt | Other | Not in school | Total |

title: Table 2: % Children enrolled in different types of pre-schools and schools. By age. 2022
description: Enrollment distribution for children aged 3 to 8 years in Odisha for the year 2022. This table breaks down participation in pre-school (Anganwadi, Govt pre-primary, Private LKG/UKG) versus formal schooling, and includes data on government school enrollment trends by gender from 2018 to 2024.

title: Table 7: % Children by grade and arithmetic level. All children. 2024
description: Foundational numeracy assessment for students in Grades I-VIII in Odisha for 2024. The table categorizes students by their highest arithmetic capability, ranging from number recognition (1-9, 11-99) to subtraction and division.

title: Table 8: Trends over time
